headline: Chevron: Why I Am Backing Up The Truck
summary: Chevron has profit growth and cost-saving initiatives, coupled with a compelling profit multiple. Read why CVX stock is a Buy for passive income investors.

headline: BP: Strategy Shift, Stock Buybacks, Cheap P/E
summary: BP p.l.c.'s Q4 earnings dropped 61% Y/Y due to lower petroleum prices and refining margins. Read why I remain very bullish on BP stock.
